feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-10-18T00:15:19.476740Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;纽约市的气动管道邮件系统</stitle>; <id>;https://untappedcities.com/2023/10/17/pneumatic-tube-mail-new-york -city/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T22:14:45.803429Z</更新>; <link href="https://untappedcities.com/2023/10/17/pneumatic-tube-mail-new -york-city/"/>; <author>; <name>;geox</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=geox</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://untappedcities.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Pneumatic-Tube-Mail-System-Post-Office-New-York-City-Header.jpg" style= “宽度：220 像素；高度：116 像素；” />;<br />;纽约市的气动管道邮件系统是一种令人着迷且高效的邮件递送方法。它于 1897 年安装，覆盖了 27 英里的路线，连接 23 个邮局。每根管道可运载 400 至 600 封信件，行驶速度为每小时 30 至 35 英里。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-pneumatic-tube-mail-system-in-new-york-city" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37922200" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;弗雷泽幻想</stitle>; <id>;https://edward-la-barbera.itch.io/frasier-fantasy</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T16:14:45.806395Z</更新>; <link href="https://edward-la-barbera.itch.io/frasier-fantasy"/>; <作者>; <name>;gaws</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gaws</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://img.itch.zone /aW1nLzEzNzE5Nzc1LnBuZw==/original/V%2Fq2F0.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：92px；" />;<br />;《Frasier Fantasy》是对回合制角色扮演游戏《Frasier》的致敬。这款游戏充满了复活节彩蛋和回调，适合那些想知道艾迪是否曾先眨眼的人。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#frasier-fantasy" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=37916855" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Llemma：数学的开放语言模型</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2310.10631</id>; <updated>;2023-10-17T18:14:45.806917Z</已更新>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2310.10631"/>; <作者>; <name>;AlphaWeaver</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=AlphaWeaver </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" 样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：129像素；” />;<br />;Llemma 是一种大型数学语言模型，它是在科学论文、包含数学的网络数据和数学代码的混合体上进行预训练的。它在 MATH 基准上优于其他开放基础模型，并且能够进行工具使用和形式定理证明，而无需进一步微调。所有工件，包括模型、数据和代码，都是公开发布的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llemma-an-open-language-model-for-mathematics" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37918327" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用间隔重复系统看懂数学题（2019）</stitle>; <id>;https://cognitivemedium.com/srs-mathematics</id >; <更新>;2023-10-17T20:14:45.807415Z</更新>; <link href="https://cognitivemedium.com/srs-mathematics"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sebg</名称>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sebg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;理解数学不是一个二元过程，而是一个开放式的旅程的加深理解。使用间隔重复系统（例如 Anki）可以帮助重复测试和强化数学概念，从而帮助实现这一过程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#using-spaced-repetition-systems-to-see-through-a-piece-of-mathematics-2019" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37920191" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GPT-4模拟的《少女图鉴入门》</stitle>; <id>;https://www. andrealyip.com/a-young-ladys-illusterated-primer</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T22:14:45.807912Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.andrealyip.com/a -young-ladys-illusterated-primer"/>; <作者>; <名称>;cl42</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cl42</uri>; </作者>; <内容type="html">;<img src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/03eae2_73e41079795b4714bd293693d270e4c2~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_446,h_446,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto /03eae2_73e41079795b4714bd293693d270e4c2~mv2.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;《钻石时代：或者，年轻女士的图解入门》是尼尔·斯蒂芬森 (Neal Stephenson) 的科幻小说，讲述了年轻女孩内尔 (Nell) 的生活，她拥有一本名为《年轻女士的图解入门》的高度互动的书。该入门课程旨在教她需要了解的一切，并适应她的个人需求和成长。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-young-lady-s-illusterated-primer-simulated-by-gpt-4" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37921832" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Ishkur 电子音乐指南</stitle>; <id>;https://music.ishkur.com/</id>; <更新>; 2023-10-17T19:14:45.808927Z</updated>; <link href="https://music.ishkur.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;diggan</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=diggan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://music.ishkur.com/closex.png" style="width ：220px；高度：221px；” />;<br />; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ishkur-s-guide-to-Electronic-music" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37919241" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;超线性回报</stitle>; <id>;http://paulgraham.com/superlinear.html</id>; <更新>;2023-10- 17T19:14:45.809403Z</updated>; <link href="http://paulgraham.com/superlinear.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;jger15</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=jger15</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文讨论了超线性回报的概念，超线性回报是指绩效回报大于线性的程度。它解释了在生活的各个方面，如商业、名誉、权力和知识，富人往往会变得更富有。文章还探讨了超线性回报的两个根本原因：指数增长和阈值。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#superlinear-returns" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=37919949" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Qaul – 独立于互联网的无线网状通信应用</stitle>; <id>;https://qaul.net/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T20:14:45.809864Z</更新>; < link href="https://qaul.net/"/>; <author>; <name>;kristianpaul</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kristianpaul</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;Qaul 是一款独立于互联网的无线网状通信应用程序。无需任何互联网或通信基础设施即可与周围的人进行点对点通信。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#qaul-internet-independent-wireless-mesh-communication-app" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37890637" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美国国税局 (IRS) 运行的免费纳税申报试点将在 13 个州推出</stitle>; <id>;https://www.irs.gov/newsroom/irs-advances -创新直接文件项目-2024年纳税季节免费国税局运行试点选项预计可用于13个州的合格纳税人</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T20:14:45.810356Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.irs.gov/newsroom/irs-advances-innovative-direct-file-project-for-2024-免税季节 irs-运行试点选项-预计可用于 13 个州的合格纳税人”/>; <author>; <name>;dwynings</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dwynings</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.irs.gov/pub/image/ logo_small.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：221px；" />;<br />;机构最终确定直接文件试点范围，具体细节将于今年秋季继续进行；EITC，IR-2023-192 涵盖的预计条款中的儿童税收抵免，2023 年 10 月 17 日华盛顿 — 作为随着更大规模的转型工作正在进行，国税局今天宣布了 2024 年申报季直接申报试点的关键细节，多个州计划加入这项创新工作。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#free -irs-run-tax-filing-pilot-to-be-available-in-13-states" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=37920633" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;WordStar：傲慢、困难、强大（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.abortretry.fail/p/arrogant-difficult-powerful</id>; <更新>;2023 -10-17T21:14:45.810849Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.abortretry.fail/p/arrogant-difficult-powerful"/>; <作者>; <名称>;elvis70</名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=elvis70</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/ w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F49b930e7-0575-4bfb-ad40- dc0934a6e163_1024x1024.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;WordStar 是一个传奇性的工具，成为许多用户自我的延伸。它是第一个商业、文本、所见即所得的文字处理器，以其功能强大和使用难度而闻名。< a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#wordstar-arrogant-difficult-powerful-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=37891469" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;我们将如何为人工智能的未来构建可持续、可扩展、安全的基础设施</stitle>; <id>;https://cloud.google.com/blog/topics/systems/google- Systems-innovations-at-ocp-global-summit</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T21:14:45.812260Z</更新>; <link href="https://cloud.google.com/blog/topics /systems/google-systems-innovations-at-ocp-global-summit"/>; <作者>; <名称>;zekrioca</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zekrioca</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-cloudblog-publish/images/googlecloud_2022_RYqbQfm.max-648x356.jpg" style="width: 220 像素； height: 109px;" />;<br />;Google 正在拥抱 AI 时代系统设计的开放式创新。他们专注于为 AI 驱动的未来构建可持续、安全和可扩展的基础设施。Google 也在做出努力促进行业的可持续性、安全性和可靠性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-we-ll-build-sustainable-scalable-secure-infrastruct-for-an-ai-未来" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37920907" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ExecuTorch：在移动和边缘设备上运行 PyTorch 程序</stitle >; <id>;https://pytorch.org/executorch/stable/index.html</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T19:14:45.812721Z</更新>; <link href="https://pytorch .org/executorch/stable/index.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;resolve-ev</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=resolve-ev</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://pytorch.org/executorch/stable/_static/img/generic-pytorch-logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;ExecuTorch 是一个 PyTorch 平台，提供在移动和边缘设备上运行 PyTorch 程序的基础设施。它旨在实现 PyTorch 程序更广泛的定制和部署功能。<a href="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/#executorch-run-pytorch-programs-on-mobile-and-edge-devices" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=37919924" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：我用无BS方法制作了一个一体化桌面应用程序来完成工作</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=37914672</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T18:14:45.813783Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37914672"/>; <author>; <name>;daniel_sushil</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=daniel_sushil</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Flooutwork 是一个全 -一体化桌面应用程序，旨在充当个人工作系统，提供一种无需废话的方法来在线完成实际工作。它集成了任务管理、日历视图以及在应用程序内固定工作应用程序的功能，以消除干扰和摩擦点。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-made-an-all-in-one-desktop-app-with-a-no-bs-approach-to-get-工作完成" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37914672" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;技术首席执行官因 IP 地址计划被判 5 年徒刑< /stitle>; <id>;https://krebsonsecurity.com/2023/10/tech-ceo-sentenced-to-5-years-in-ip-address-scheme/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T17 :14:45.814272Z</更新>; <link href="https://krebsonsecurity.com/2023/10/tech-ceo-sentenced-to-5-years-in-ip-address-scheme/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti </uri>; </作者>; <content type =“html”>;<img src =“https” ://krebsonsecurity.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/amirgolestan-image.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：140px；" />;<br />;Micfo LLC 首席执行官 Amir Golestan 因电信诈骗罪被判处五年监禁。他利用虚假公司获取了数十万个IP地址，并承认了20项电信诈骗罪。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tech-ceo-sentenced-to-5-years-in-ip-address-scheme" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37917597" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;*(char*)0 = 0; – C++ 程序员使用这段代码的目的是什么？ [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dFIqNZ8VbRY</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T18:14:45.814764Z</更新>; <link href= "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dFIqNZ8VbRY"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rramadass</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rramadass</ uri>; </author>; <content type=“html”>;<iframe src=“//www.youtube.com/embed/dFIqNZ8VbRY”frameborder=“0”allowfullscreen loading=“lazy”>;</iframe>; <a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#char-0-0-what-does-the-c-programmer-intend-with-this-code-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37910983" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;循环矩阵、特征向量和 FFT</stitle>; <id>;https://www.johndcook.com/blog /2023/05/12/circulant-matrices/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T14:14:45.815271Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.johndcook.com/blog/2023 /05/12/circulant-matrices/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti </uri>; </作者>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://www.johndcook.com/clock_fft.png”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 234px;" />;<br />;循环矩阵是一个方阵，其中每一行都是前一行的旋转。这篇文章说明了循环矩阵和 FFT（快速傅里叶变换）之间的联系。 <a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#circulant-matrices-eigenvectors-and-the-fft" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=37915044" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;小企业主表示，他们迫于压力而雇用休班警察以确保安全</stitle>; <id>;https://minnesotareformer.com/2023/10/17/small-business -所有者-他们-有-压力-雇用-下班-mpd-cops-for-security/ </ id>; <更新>; 2023-10-17T13：14：45.816166Z </更新>; <link href = “https://minnesotareformer.com/2023/10/17/small-business-owners-they-are-pressed-to-hire-off-duty-mpd-cops-for-security/”/>; <作者>; <名称>;danso</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=danso</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// minnesotareformer.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/ridealong_005-1024x683.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：147px;" />;<br />;明尼阿波利斯的小企业主，特别是移民和有色人种拥有的小企业主，表示他们被迫雇用下班警察以确保安全。这些企业主声称，雇用警察是一种歧视，他们被引导认为他们必须雇用警察，否则就有被警察忽视的风险。下班后的工作<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#small-business -owners-say-they-re-stressed-to-hire-off-duty-cops-for-security" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=37914243" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;JetBrains 的 AI 图形</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.jetbrains.com/blog/2023/10/16/ai-graphics-at-jetbrains-story/< /id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T22:14:45.816622Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.jetbrains.com/blog/2023/10/16/ai-graphics-at-jetbrains -story/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;SerCe</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=SerCe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://blog.jetbrains.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/idea_2016-1.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;在 JetBrains，我们使用深度神经网络为网站元素生成艺术并发布图形。我们的方法允许高度个性化，并且我们正在不断努力改进它。<a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ai-graphics-at-jetbrains" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=37922272" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;计费引擎不能解决定价问题</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tier.run/blog/pricing-engine-vs-billing-engine</id>; <updated>;2023 -10-17T16:14:45.817081Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.tier.run/blog/pricing-engine-vs-billing-engine"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jmacd< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jmacd</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.tier.运行/api/og/ogBlog?title=Billing%20Engines%20Dont%20Solve%20Pricing%20Problems&description=One%20lesson%20we've%20learned%20talking%20to%20companies%20on%20their%20pricing%20journeys%20(和%20from%20our%20own%20in%20the%20过去）%20是%20the%20importance%20of%20separating%20the%20concepts%20of%20'Billing%20Engine'%20and%20'Pricing%20Engine'。" style= “宽度：220px； height: 116px;" />;<br />;我们在与公司讨论定价过程时学到的一个教训是区分“计费引擎”和“定价引擎”概念的重要性。计费引擎是向客户计费的堆栈，而定价引擎是管理和实现定价模型的组件。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#billing-engines-don-t-solve-pricing-problems" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37916840" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;最大的希腊手稿？</stitle>; <id>;https:// /blogs.bl.uk/digitizedmanuscripts/2023/10/the-largest-greek-manuscript.html</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T12:14:45.817539Z</更新>; <link href="https: //blogs.bl.uk/digitizedmanuscripts/2023/10/the-largest-greek-manuscript.html"/>; <author>; <name>;benbreen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=benbreen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-largest-greek-manuscript" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37902837" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;博客到底发生了什么？</stitle>; <id>;https:// /blog.whiona.me/what-happened-to-blogging-for-the-hell-of-it/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T20:14:45.818041Z</更新>; <link href= “https://blog.whiona.me/what-happened-to-blogging-for-the-hell-of-it/”/>; <作者>; <名称>;bovermyer</名称>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bovermyer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;我决定创建一个大写 B 博客是一时兴起，大约发生在两周前。从那时起，我就开始迷茫，不知道接下来该写什么。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-happened-to-blogging-for-the-hell-of-it" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37920697" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GaussianDreamer：从文本快速生成 3D 高斯分布</stitle>; <id>;https://taoranyi.com/gaussiandreamer/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T15:14:45.818540Z</更新>; <link href="https://taoranyi.com/gaussiandreamer/"/>; <作者>; <name>;bondarchuk</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bondarchuk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://taoranyi.com/gaussiandreamer/static/compare.png “样式=”宽度：220px;高度：113px;“ />;<br />;论文提出了一种名为 GaussianDreamer 的快速 3D 生成框架，它结合了 3D 和 2D 扩散模型的强大功能。它利用 3D 扩散模型生成初始化点云，然后使用 2D 扩散模型对其进行优化。该框架可以在一个 GPU 上 25 分钟内生成高质量的 3D 实例。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gaussiandreamer-fast- Generation-from-text-to-3d-gaussian-splatting" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37915662" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;与 Software Unscripted 的 Troels Henriksen 一起设计编译器以提高速度</stitle>; <id>;https://podbay.fm/p/software-unscripted/ e/1697165940</id>; <更新>;2023-10-17T18:14:45.819024Z</更新>; <link href="https://podbay.fm/p/software-unscripted/e/1697165940"/>; <作者>; <name>;matt_d</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=matt_d</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://cdn-images.podbay.fm/eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1cmwiOiJodHRwczovL3N0b3JhZ2UuZ29vZ2xlYXBpcy5jb20vY29tLXJlc29uYXRlcmVjb3JkaW5ncy1wdWJsaW MvY292ZXItYXJ0LzN5VURTbFdpbVhBbG5oN0Jtb3pIUTNXa0pzR2dOUjRHNzRUaHLLS1QuanBnIiwiZmFsbGJhy2siOiJodHRwczovL2lzMS1zc2wubXpzdGF0aWMuY29tL2ltYWdlL3RodW 1iL1BvZGNhc3RzMTE2L3Y0Lzk1LzNjLzBhLzk1M2MwYTQxLTA3NDAtMTZlZi1hOTVhLTc3OTBjOTM2ZDA2YS9temFfNzMxMDcwOTkzMDkzNzgzMjiI1My5qcGcvNjAweDYwMGJiLmpwZyJ9.G muihHLTYWEmpKPxCaAeZfCGzv7YaXgRsXvDKj62rks.jpg？宽度=400&高度=400" style="宽度：220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;在 Podbay（网络上最好的播客播放器）上轻松收听与 Troels Henriksen 一起设计速度编译器，这是 Software Unscripted 的一集。<a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#designing-compilers-for-speed-with-troels-henriksen-from-software-unscripted" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=37892017" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;我们如何清理科学记录？</stitle>; <id>;https://academic.oup.com/function/article/4/6/zqad055/7306462</id >; <更新>;2023-10-17T21:14:45.819474Z</更新>; <link href="https://academic.oup.com/function/article/4/6/zqad055/7306462"/>; <作者>; <name>;wjb3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wjb3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /oup.silverchair-cdn.com/oup/backfile/Content_public/Journal/function/Issue/4/6/7/m_cover.jpeg?Expires=1700601276&Signature=rzuig6Z~lprRXLbuqOYGYmyXXG1ToZ1revhXyHKHVgUeM4TftvfqXRs00m-BRpTBeXDCAYb Aji79Ju04GzLNTec~S~Qc9306me5H5ko1Mqw6e8OE5giQa4b58j~hBh7Ino6pG4Zh8CXyp3BhwoTPjBXfIoKSTOh6sl8~lkXgN4Hn3w8JPH5zFw8GS5dCrurA9LmCRq05zLuraJPB8wcEXiXzjy 3rOC44wNY04Svp99US6QbnjCwiB1aOJtKJDVG6QxO6QlB-7yf3iXfQCSQKacJRkJXC -SOgd4txYm7JCpKzX5lUIVcsJ-HTHL-dQyXebpCiajdOopErDcmu75gZ8A__&密钥对-Id=APKAIE5G5CRDK6RD3PGA" style="width: 220px; height: 285px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了纠正科学记录中的错误以确保其可靠性的重要性。它重点介绍了之前发表的一篇关于氨氯地平作用机制的文章中存在严重错误的案例，氨氯地平是一种文章强调学术透明、批判性评价、接受错误并迅速纠正，以维护科学研究的信任和进步。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io /#how-do-we-clean-up-the-scientific-record" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 37921576" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;让 CRDT 更高效</stitle>; <id>;https://jakelazaroff.com/words/making-crdts-98-percent-more-efficient/</id>; <updated>;2023-10-17T15:14 ：45.819925Z </更新>; <link href="https://jakelazaroff.com/words/making-crdts-98-percent-more-efficient/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jakelazaroff </名称>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jakelazaroff</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://jakelazaroff.com/og/building-a -collaborative-pixel-art-editor-with-crdts.png" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了减小使用基于状态的 CRDT 的协作像素艺术编辑器的大小的过程。通过实施各种压缩技术，CRDT 状态的大小从 648kb 减小到14kb，大小减少了 98%。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#making-crdts-more-efficient" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37915934" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
